title: Hypocritical Playerbase
body:
Asking to group together is NOT toxic.
Suggesting to back off dragon is NOT toxic.
Telling you to focus on the game and mute one another is NOT toxic.
ESPECIALLY if these are all said in a kind manner without swear words.

It's a growing problem where players disguise their own toxicity by pointing fingers at others.  Yes, it's ok to observe that someone is being particularly rude, but that doesn't justify you calling them a "toxic %%%%".  All you're doing is worsening the problem and proving that you are toxic yourself.  Be more mature.

Thumbs up/down to decide something, no way to leave a reply, inbetween or ask for more intel.

You put 1 Person in a Room with 9 others, they are to decide the fate and judgement of a person.
